description.headline: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
description.summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a 10% Vitamin C serum featuring Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid. Designed for Oily and Combination skin types, it delivers brightening and fades dark spots.

detailed.description: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps achieve a brighter, more radiant complexion through its 10% Vitamin C formula.
The active ingredients in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum work to reduce the appearance of dark spots and hyperpigmentation over time.

usage.instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

warnings: Use sunscreen when using this product during the day
Patch test recommended before first use
